headline: Is It Time To Reassess Kyndryl (KD) After Its IBM Separation And Mixed Share Performance?
summary: If you are wondering whether Kyndryl Holdings at around US$27.05 is starting to look like value or still carries too much uncertainty, you are not alone. The share price return sits at 1.2% over the last 7 days, 0.5% over the past month, 6.1% year to date and a 27.9% decline over the last year, while the 3 year return is 115.0%. This gives a mixed picture of how the market has been reassessing the company over different time frames. Recent headlines have focused on Kyndryl's position as an...
